trans-unit.source: Represents a chart area on the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 表示圖表影像中的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: Within any given chart, the *inner plot position* is the rectangular area, inside the x and y-axis lines, where the data points are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在任何給定的圖表中*內部繪圖區位置*是一個矩形區域，在 x 和 y 軸的行，其中資料點繪製。

trans-unit.source: The *plot position* is the rectangular area that encompasses the inner plot position, the tick marks, and the axis labels.
trans-unit.target: *繪製位置*是包含內部繪圖區位置、 刻度標記和軸標籤的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The *chart area* is the rectangular area that encompasses the plot position, the tick marks, the axis labels and the axis titles on the chart.
trans-unit.target: *圖表區域*是包含繪圖區位置、 刻度標記、 軸標籤和軸標題，在圖表上的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: A chart area is represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> class; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 圖表區域由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>類別;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件會儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The number of chart series that can be plotted in a chart area is unlimited.
trans-unit.target: 圖表區域中可繪製圖表數列的數目沒有限制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件：

trans-unit.source: Uses one distinct inner plotting area.
trans-unit.target: 會使用一個不同的內部繪圖區。

trans-unit.source: Is used to plot one or more chart series.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製一或多個圖表數列。

trans-unit.source: Has primary and secondary x and y-axes, except for pie and doughnut chart types.
trans-unit.target: 有主要和次要 x 和 y 軸，除了圓形圖和環圈圖類型。

trans-unit.source: When you use Shape chart types, which includes pie, doughnut, funnel, pyramid, polar, and radar charts, the inner plotting position defines the size of the chart type shape.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用形狀圖圖表類型，包括圓形圖、 環圈圖、 漏斗圖、 極座標圖、 金字塔和雷達圖時，則內部繪製位置會定義圖表類型圖形的大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you increase the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property on a pie chart, you will increase the radius of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您增加值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>屬性在圓形圖上，您會增加派形的半徑。

trans-unit.source: For all other chart types, each chart area has two sets of X- and Y-axes, primary and secondary.
trans-unit.target: 對於所有其他圖表類型，每個圖表區域有兩組 X 軸和 y 軸，主要和次要。

trans-unit.source: To access properties related to these axes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY2%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取與這些軸相關的屬性，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY2%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to set a property that affects all axes on the chart, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Axes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要設定的屬性會影響在圖表上的所有軸，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Axes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: One or more series are associated with a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 一個或多個數列是圖表區域相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The series has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> property that determines the chart area that each series belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 數列有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>判斷所屬的每個數列的圖表區域的屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the series is connected to the default chart area.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，數列會連接到預設的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: To disable the display of a series, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> property of that series to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用一系列的顯示，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>為零長度字串，該數列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If another chart area is added to the chart, you can associate any series with the new chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一個圖表區域加入到圖表時，可以將任何數列與新的圖表區域產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: In all Shape chart types, as well as bar and stacked bar chart types, each series must be plotted in a separate chart area.
trans-unit.target: 在所有形狀圖圖表類型，以及橫條圖和堆疊的橫條圖類型，必須個別的圖表區域中繪製每個數列。

trans-unit.source: In all other chart types, multiple series can be combined in the same chart area.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他圖表類型，可以結合多個數列相同圖表區域中。

trans-unit.source: A 3D chart is displayed on a chart area-by-chart area basis.
trans-unit.target: 3D 圖表會顯示在圖表區域的圖表區域為基礎。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A> property to enable and customize your chart in 3D.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A>屬性設為啟用，並自訂您的圖表，以 3D。

trans-unit.source: The chart area minimum and maximum will not be automatically recalculated if you add new data, so the chart will not automatically change axis sizes.
trans-unit.target: 最小和最大的圖表區域將不會自動重新計算如果您將加入新的資料，因此圖表不會自動變更軸的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can require the chart area to recalculate these values by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要重新計算這些值所使用的圖表區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To align multiple chart areas vertically, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要垂直對齊多個圖表區域，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To align multiple chart areas horizontally, you must first position the chart areas using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> property, and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> property to Horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 若要水平對齊多個圖表區域，您必須先將圖表區域使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>屬性，並將其設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>水平的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To suppress the display of a series, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> property of that series to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 若要抑制一系列的顯示方式，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>為零長度字串，該數列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>類別。

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you use one of the `Add` or `Insert` methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> collection property to add a chart area at run time.
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議您使用其中一個`Add`或`Insert`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>集合屬性，若要在執行階段加入圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: The name for the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> class with the specified chart area name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的圖表區域名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment orientation of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表區域的對齊方向。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations" /> enumeration value that specifies the alignment orientation of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域對齊方向的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>屬性，它是可以對齊或同步處理兩個或多個圖表區域水平、 垂直或兩者。

trans-unit.source: First, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property to the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>屬性的名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件。

trans-unit.source: This chart area will then be aligned, based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment.
trans-unit.target: 此圖表區域再將對齊，根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>設定，可定義要使用的對齊方式，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>設定，可定義應該用來設定對齊的圖表區域的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>屬性未設定，在圖表區域不會對齊，而不論<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 的對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentStyles" /> enumeration value that can represent either a single value or the bitwise-OR of multiple values that define the alignment to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentStyles" /> 列舉值，可以表示單一個值，或是多個值 (定義要使用的對齊方式) 的位元 OR。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> property to align two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>水平、 垂直對齊兩個或多個圖表區域屬性或兩者。

trans-unit.source: The alignment type is one of the following values, or a bitwise OR combination of the values below.
trans-unit.target: 對齊類型是下列值之一或下面的值的位元 OR 組合。

trans-unit.source: Member Name
trans-unit.target: 成員名稱

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: All
trans-unit.target: 全部

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are aligned using all values.
trans-unit.target: 圖表區域會使用所有的值來對齊。

trans-unit.source: AxesView
trans-unit.target: AxesView

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are aligned using the View of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檢視對齊圖表區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>。

trans-unit.source: Cursor
trans-unit.target: Cursor

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are aligned on the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 在資料指標上對齊圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are not automatically aligned.
trans-unit.target: 圖表區域不會自動對齊。

trans-unit.source: Position
trans-unit.target: 位置

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are aligned with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> of the chart area specified.
trans-unit.target: 與圖表區域對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>指定圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: InnerPlotPosition
trans-unit.target: InnerPlotPosition

trans-unit.source: Chart areas are aligned with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> of the chart area specified.
trans-unit.target: 與圖表區域對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>指定圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> value is not set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>未設定值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object to which this chart area should be aligned.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件名稱，而此圖表區域應該對齊該物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object to which this chart area should be aligned.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件名稱的 <see langword="string" /> 值，而此圖表區域應該對齊該物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>屬性，它是可以對齊或同步處理兩個或多個圖表區域水平、 垂直或兩者。

trans-unit.source: First, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property to the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>屬性的名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件。

trans-unit.source: This chart area will then be aligned, based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment.
trans-unit.target: 此圖表區域再將對齊，根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>設定，可定義要使用的對齊方式，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>設定，可定義應該用來設定對齊的圖表區域的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>屬性未設定，在圖表區域不會對齊，而不論<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> object, which is used to implement three-dimensional (3D) for all series in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> 物件，可用於實作圖表區域中所有數列的立體 (3D) 效果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> object that implements 3D for all series plotted in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> 物件，實作所有繪製於圖表區域中數列的立體效果。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable 3D for a chart area, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用或停用 3D 圖表區域，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the chart is drawn in 3D, scale breaks are not supported on the axis.
trans-unit.target: 以 3D 繪製圖表時，軸上不支援刻度斷層。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that represents all axes for a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示圖表區域中所有座標軸的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> objects that represents all axes used by a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件的陣列，表示圖表區域使用的所有座標軸。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this property is to provide access to the properties of the X, Y, X2 and Y2 axes at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的主要用途是提供存取的 X，Y，X2，Y2 座標軸，在設計階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the axes for a chart area should be accessed using the individual axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，圖表區域的軸應該存取使用個別的軸屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you decide to use this property at run time—for example, in an event—you can access an item in this array by specifying an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName> enumeration member as the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果您決定要在執行階段使用這個屬性 — 例如，在事件 — 您可以存取這個陣列中的項目，藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName>列舉成員的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the primary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示主要 X 軸。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the primary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示主要 X 軸。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the primary X-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來操作主要 x 軸，圖表區域中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the secondary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示次要 X 軸。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the secondary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示次要 X 軸。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the secondary X-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來操作在圖表區域次要 x 軸。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the primary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示主要 Y 軸。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the primary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示主要 Y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the primary Y-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來操作主要 y 軸，圖表區域中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the secondary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示次要 Y 軸。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the secondary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示次要 Y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the secondary Y-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來操作在圖表區域次要 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that specifies the background color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域背景色彩的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color.White" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color.White" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>值將會是如果您已指定背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此色彩為"透明"— 也就是如果您使用 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給圖表區域的背景。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，背景會變成透明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area, and also determines whether or not a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表區域背景漸層的方向，並決定是否使用漸層效果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area and determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域背景漸層方向以及判斷是否使用漸層的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to determine whether a chart area will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性來判斷是否在圖表區域會顯示漸層，並用來判斷所使用漸層的方向，如果有一個。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用漸層色彩：

trans-unit.source: Set the primary color of the chart area background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定主要色彩與圖表區域背景的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color of the chart area background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定與圖表區域背景次要色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 設定此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性所需的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域影線樣式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉值會指定使用類型的筆刷的影線樣式<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>。

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用影線樣式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 影線線條的色彩由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the URL of an image file, used as the background image of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 表示做為圖表區背景影像使用之影像檔的 URL 的 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定影像位置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定其中一個設定為"透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: 影像是.NET Framework 中，包括圖示所支援的任何有效圖形檔。

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> background image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 背景影像的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> enumeration value that specifies the alignment of the background image of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域背景影像對齊的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle.TopLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle.TopLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the chart area, and is only applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會決定圖表區域的背景影像的對齊方式，而且套用的時，才會<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available alignments, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的對齊方式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>列舉主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object background image that will be drawn as transparent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定會以透明繪製之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件背景影像的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the color of a background image that will be drawn as transparent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，表示以透明方式繪製之背景影像的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件背景影像的繪製模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域背景影像繪圖模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Tile" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Tile" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性會決定如何顯示影像; 影像可以並排顯示，縮放等等。

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合圖表區域的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從 圖表區域的左上角開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>列舉主題。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>，其中繪製影像的位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件背景的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that specifies the secondary color for the background of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域背景次要色彩的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性是其中幾個相關的屬性，判斷的次要背景色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用影線，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性會決定圖表區域的影線線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart area:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的圖表區域背景的漸層色彩：

trans-unit.source: Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定主要色彩與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定與次要色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性所需的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that specifies the border color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，指定圖表區域的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderColor%2A> property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderColor%2A>任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For pie and doughnut charts, this property determines the color of radial and horizontal lines if data labels are drawn outside the pie or doughnut—that is, if the `LabelStyle` custom property is set to "Outside".
trans-unit.target: 圓形圖和環圈圖的此屬性決定星形和水平線條的色彩資料標籤繪製圓形圖或環圈圖之外，也就是如果`LabelStyle`自訂屬性設定為 「 外部 」。

trans-unit.source: This property also determines the marker lines for 3D charts if the `ShowMarkerLines` custom property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也會決定為 3D 圖表的標記線條如果`ShowMarkerLines`自訂屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 列舉值，決定圖表區域的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderDashStyle%2A> property determines the line style to use for a border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderDashStyle%2A>屬性會決定要用於框線的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 可以是實線、 虛線，等等。

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 其他的框線樣式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>列舉主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，決定圖表區域的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderWidth%2A> property can also set the width of lines for line charts, custom legend items displayed with a line style, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BorderWidth%2A>屬性也可以設定為折線圖，顯示為線條樣式，依此類推的自訂圖例項目線條的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> object that is used for cursors and selected ranges along the X-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> 物件，這個物件用於沿著 X 軸的資料指標和選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> object used for cursors and selected ranges along the X-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> 物件，用於沿著 X 軸的資料指標和選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> object is used for the X-axis cursor and its selected ranges.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>物件用於 x 軸資料指標和其選取的範圍。

trans-unit.source: For all charts except bar chart types, the X-axis cursor represents the vertical cursor.
trans-unit.target: 除了橫條圖類型中的所有圖表，x 軸資料指標都代表垂直游標。

trans-unit.source: For bar chart types, the X-axis cursor represents the horizontal cursor.
trans-unit.target: 橫條圖類型中，x 軸資料指標代表水平游標。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> class documentation for a description of its members, as well as sample source code.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>類別文件，其成員的說明，以及來源的程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> object that is used for cursors and selected ranges along the Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> 物件，這個物件用於沿著 Y 軸的資料指標和選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> object used for cursors and selected ranges along the Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor" /> 物件，用於沿著 Y 軸的資料指標和選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> object is used for the Y-axis cursor and its selected ranges.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>物件用於 y 軸資料指標和其選取的範圍。

trans-unit.source: For all charts except bar chart types, the Y-axis cursor represents the horizontal cursor.
trans-unit.target: 除了橫條圖類型中的所有圖表，以 y 軸資料指標會代表水平游標。

trans-unit.source: For bar chart types, the Y-axis cursor represents the vertical cursor.
trans-unit.target: 橫條圖類型的 y 軸資料指標會代表垂直游標。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> class documentation for a description of its members, as well as sample source code.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>類別文件，其成員的說明，以及來源的程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源，<see langword="false" /> 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源 (後者為選擇性釋放)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> for which the depth is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取深度的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the depth of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 傳回圖表區域中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> 的深度。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the depth of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" />, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="float" /> 值，表示指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> 的寬度，該值會以圖表區域深度的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the depth of a specified series.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，取得指定之數列的深度。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth, which is the same unit of measurement used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.Z%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值會以圖表區域的深度，也就是相同的度量單位的百分比表示用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.Z%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: All series have a depth, regardless of their chart type.
trans-unit.target: 所有數列都有的深度，不論其圖表類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, even point and bubble series have a depth, even though the entire depth is not used to draw the points or bubbles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，即使點和泡泡圖數列都有深度，即使整個深度不用來繪製的點或泡泡。

trans-unit.source: The depth of a series can be used to determine a Z value for a point that is used in a custom drawing routine.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的深度可以用來判斷用於自訂繪圖常式點的 Z 值。

trans-unit.source: Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 用於自訂的 3D 繪製任何點必須從相對 3D 座標轉換為 2D 相對座標表示，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method for both the X and Y axes.
trans-unit.target: 若要從軸中取得相對 X 和 Y 值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>X 和 Y 軸的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> for which the Z position is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取 Z 位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Z position of a series, which is useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: 傳回數列的 Z 位置，這對自訂繪圖而言相當實用。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the Z position of the specified series, which is measured as a percentage of the depth of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="float" /> 值，表示特定數列的 Z 位置，該值會測量為圖表區域深度的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the Z position of a series.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來取得一系列的 Z 位置。

trans-unit.source: The Z position is measured from the back wall of the chart area to the center of a data series, and is represented as a percentage of the chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: Z 位置起至中央資料數列時，圖表區域的背景牆，並以圖表區域深度的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, a series that is drawn halfway along the Z-axis has a Z position of 50.
trans-unit.target: 例如，沿著 z 軸一半繪製一系列具有 Z 位置為 50。

trans-unit.source: The Z position of a series is normally used for a custom drawing routine.
trans-unit.target: 自訂繪圖常式通常用於一系列的 Z 位置。

trans-unit.source: Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 用於自訂的 3D 繪製任何點必須從相對 3D 座標轉換為 2D 相對座標表示，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method for both the X and Y axes.
trans-unit.target: 若要從軸中取得相對 X 和 Y 值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>X 和 Y 軸的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object, which defines the inner plot position of a chart area object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 物件，定義圖表區域物件的內層繪圖位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object, which defines the inner plot position of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 物件，定義 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的內層繪圖位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property defines the rectangle within a chart area element that is used for plotting data; it excludes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>屬性會定義用來繪製資料的圖表區域項目中的矩形，則它會排除刻度或軸標籤等等。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object, and not to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個屬性 (0，0 到 100100) 座標與相關<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件，而非整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property can be used to align multiple chart areas.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>屬性可以用來將多個圖表區域對齊。

trans-unit.source: However, if one chart area has tick marks and axis labels and another one does not, their axis lines cannot be aligned.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果一個圖表區域具有刻度和軸標籤和另一個則否，不能對齊其座標軸線。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the size of charts, such as pie or doughnut, without changing the size of the generated chart image.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來變更圖表，例如圓形圖或環圈圖的大小，而不會變更產生的圖表影像的大小。

trans-unit.source: To change the position of an entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更位置的整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件都會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>屬性改為。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if the labels of the relevant chart area axes are of equal size.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，決定相關圖表區域座標軸的標籤大小是否一致。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all axes that have their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit" /> property set to <see langword="true" /> and will display their labels using the same font size; otherwise, <see langword="false." />
trans-unit.target: 如果所有座標軸的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="true" />，並使用相同大小字型來顯示其標籤，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false." />。

trans-unit.source: The font size is automatically calculated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, with the largest size that fits being used.
trans-unit.target: 由自動計算字型大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項，以符合所使用的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to all chart area axes that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性適用於所有圖表區域軸具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique name of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the unique name of a <see langword="ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示 <see langword="ChartArea" /> 物件的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object must be unique, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件必須是唯一的否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可用來當做索引子時擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object that defines the position of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 物件，定義 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object that defines the position of a chart area object within the chart image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 物件，定義圖表影像中圖表區域物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>, and includes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性定義的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>，並包含刻度標記、 軸標籤和其他等等。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個屬性 (0，0 到 100100) 座標與整個圖表影像。

trans-unit.source: Recalculates the properties of the chart area after changes have been made to the chart in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在對 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize" /> 事件中的圖表進行變更後，重新計算圖表區域的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize> event to make changes, it is sometimes necessary to recalculate chart area properties so that the chart is rendered correctly.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>事件進行變更，則有時需要重新計算圖表區域屬性，以便正確地轉譯圖表。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an axis range is changed, the labels for that axis must be recalculated.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果軸範圍已變更，則必須重新計算該座標軸的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Call this method after you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize> event to make ANY changes to a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，在使用後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>於圖表區域的事件，進行任何變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that specifies the shadow color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 指定圖表區域陰影色彩的 T<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值可用來達到 「 實際 」 遮蔽的效果。「 128,0,0,0"陰影的色彩值再試一次。

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要實作陰影，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.ShadowOffset%2A>屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />，表示圖表區域的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要實作遮蔽，請使用零 (0) 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: 正值會導致往下及往右移位的陰影。

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: 負值會導致向上和向左移位的陰影。

trans-unit.source: An array of 3D points.
trans-unit.target: 立體資料點的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Applies 3D transformations to an array of 3D points, which must be done before GDI+ drawing methods can be called.
trans-unit.target: 將立體轉換套用到立體資料點的陣列，必須先完成這個步驟，才能夠呼叫 GDI+ 繪製方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a chart area is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，決定是否顯示圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the chart area is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會顯示圖表區域，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this flag is set to `false`, all series, legends, titles and annotation objects associated with the chart area will also be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 當這個旗標設為`false`，也會隱藏圖表區域相關聯的所有數列、 圖例、 標題和註解物件。
